thread.title: A Scramble In The House Pushes Paul Ryan Back Into The Spotlight

title: A Scramble In The House Pushes Paul Ryan Back Into The Spotlight
text:
A Scramble In The House Pushes Paul Ryan Back Into The Spotlight October 10, 2015 5:05 PM ET 
Audio for this story from All Things Considered will be available at approximately 7:00 p.m. ET. 
National Review contributor Neil Minkoff explains what's at stake as House Republicans figure out who will be their next speaker â€” and whether Rep. Paul Ryan will run for the job.
